sentences.sentence: No one knows how Wilson got necrotizing fasciitis.
sentences.translation: 没有人知道Wilson如何染上坏死性筋膜炎。

sentences.sentence: It can lead to plantar fasciitis and heel pain and can worsen hammertoes and bunions.
sentences.translation: 肥胖会导致足底筋膜炎和足跟疼痛，也会使槌状趾和囊炎肿(也就是鸡眼，译者注)恶化。

sentences.sentence: Now, one of the most common types of overuse injuries we see Heel Spur Syndrome, or Plantar Fasciitis.
sentences.translation: 目前，最常见的一种过劳性损伤是跟骨骨刺综合症或足底筋膜炎。
